strings.Value: "What is the greatest goldsmith in Restov doing in this backwater?"
"Why should I help you?"
"Very well, you shall have your gemstone."
"I'll think about it."
"I have many important matters to deal with. I'm sorry, but I can't help you."
"Please remind me what you asked for."
"I am still looking for a suitable jewel."
"Here is your emerald."

"There you are! I've wanted to see you in person for a long time – all of {g|Brevoy}Brevoy{/g} is talking about your feats..." {n}The girl is smiling curiously. Sizing you up, she finally nods to you.{/n} "Mim Wobblegander, the greatest goldsmith in {g|Restov}Restov{/g}, at your service! Happy to meet the ruler of this land!"
"As you wish, as you wish... Alas, I was thinking about staying for a while. But on the other hand, there are so many other places I want visit!"
"Hmmm. I suppose that'll have to do for now. I'm in no hurry to leave, anyways – the marvelous views you have here are just too good!"
"Wonderful! I shall impatiently await your return."

"Let's say... if I'm provided an appropriate place to work, I wouldn't mind staying for a while, to draw upon the special inspiration that these lands give me. Of course, I would express gratitude to my patron from time to time, with gifts befitting {mf|his|her} status and my mastery."

"Seeking recognition and inspiration! You see, not everyone in {g|Restov}Restov{/g} realizes how unfairly destiny has divided its gifts between me and my competitors. I got all the talent, you see, and they got all the glory and respect. It's all nonsense, though – I'll soon remedy this irksome situation..."

"You know, it's quite beautiful here! The view of a lake, surrounded by picturesque green forest, were inspiration for a lovely brooch design... I do have a sapphire, but no green jewels, and I've no idea who can help me with this. We're surrounded by simpletons here, who know nothing of sublime matters... except for you, of course!" {n}Mim looks at you meaningfully.{/n}
"Aha!" {n}The girl looks at you with eager impatience.{/n} "So what about my request?"

"For an emerald. I plan to make a brooch that will combine the hues of these lands – the blue of the cold lake and the green of the young pines. I do have a sapphire, but I'm missing a green jewel..."
{n}Mim's eyes flash.{/n} "Look at that color! And the size! An excellent item... Finally I'll be able to bring my idea to life!"
"I see..." {n}Mim sighs.{/n}

"Wonderful. I am ready to remain here and work for {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. I only need a place to live and work. I've brought all the necessary tools. All I need is four walls and a roof – and a salary, of course, I do need to eat. But I'll make it up to you!"

"Besides, I'm mortally tired of {g|Restov}Restov{/g} dust and grayness. And the view from here to the {g|Tors of Levenies}Tors of Levenies{/g} is beyond compare! Just look at those peaks! Such mysterious power in their easy dignity!"
